channel.title: How to make owner a admin?
channel.description:
I need to know how to make "ME" a admin of my rsc server so that way I can finally finish it :rolleyes:
Well ok, next time I will use the search button. AND I guess this could now be another search topics to help others! :eek:

item.title: How to make owner a admin?
item.dc:creator: @mapu mapu
item.description:
@mapu wrote:

[quote=“adu, post:4, topic:255337”][quote author=mapu link=topic=337398.msg2619980#msg2619980 date=1231303537]
Change your user-id to 3 instead of 1 in the database.

Next time use the search button, you will not get your ass flamed every time you make a useless topic if you use it.
[/quote]

Im pretty sure its the other way around :)[/quote]
Haven’t done it in ages, but you get the jist

Read full topic
item.source: How to make owner a admin?
